statements: DELETE FROM telepsychiatry_ehr_integration WHERE patient_id = 123 AND appointment_date = '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM telepsychiatry_ehr_integration WHERE psychiatrist_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND diagnosis LIKE '%anxiety%';
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe' AND blood_pressure > 120;
DELETE FROM treatment_plan WHERE patient_id = 10 AND plan_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TelepsychiatryAppointments WHERE provider_id = 101 AND appointment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 201 AND prescription = 'Antidepressants' OR diagnosis = 'Anxiety Disorder';
DELETE FROM patient_care_plan WHERE patient_id = 2001 AND care_plan_id = 1;
